attributes.action: Re-instate the "undesirable" elements of inflation back into the RPI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whereas we are informed that inflation is "low" and "under control" we are all inflicted with increasing prices to housing, food, heating and fuel. If these were all incorporated into the calculation of the inflation rate perhaps greater pressure could be brought to bear to try and control the upward spiral of costs that are crippling so many in this country.
